mapper.select: select a.id,softwareName,APKName,supportROM,interfaceLanguage,softwareSize,downloads, d1.valueName as flatformName,ac1.categoryName as categoryLevel1Name,ac2.categoryName as categoryLevel2Name,ac3.categoryName as categoryLevel3Name,d2.valueName as statusName, appInfo,logoPicPath from app_info a left join (select * from data_dictionary where typeName='所属平台') d1 on a.flatformId=d1.valueId left join (select * from data_dictionary where typeName='APP状态') d2 on a.status=d2.valueId left join (select * from app_category where parentId is null ) ac1 on a.categoryLevel1=ac1.id left join (select * from app_category where parentId in (1,2) ) ac2 on a.categoryLevel2=ac2.id left join (select * from app_category where parentId not in (1,2) ) ac3 on a.categoryLevel3=ac3.id where a.id=#{id}

select a.id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, updateDate, devId, appInfo, status, onSaleDate, offSaleDate, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, a.createdBy, a.creationDate, a.modifyBy, a.modifyDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath, versionId, valueName as statusname from app_info a left join (select * from data_dictionary where typeName='APP状态') d on a.status = d.valueId where a.id=#{id}
